Global Variable# kVTDecompressionPropertyKey_MaximizePowerEfficiency

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 10.2+visionOS 1.0+

```
let kVTDecompressionPropertyKey_MaximizePowerEfficiency: CFString
```
